    • Method Detail

      • notifyRouteUpdate

        void notifyRouteUpdate(ByteArray p)
        stores the update data in a shared memory to be processed by the 'RoutingProtocol' thread later
        Parameters:
        p - ByteArray

      • notifyPortStatusChange

        public void notifyPortStatusChange(int interfaceId,
                          boolean status)
        update the routing table according to the changed status of an interface; if interface is UP (status=TRUE), add to routing table, if interface is down, remove from routing table
        Parameters:
        interfaceId - interface id of the router
        status - status denoting whether interface is on or off, true if on and false otehrwise

      • getNextHop

        NextHop getNextHop(IpAddress dstIp)
        returns an NextHop object corresponding the destination IP Address, dstIP. If route in unknown, return null
        Parameters:
        destination - ip
        Returns:
        returns an NextHop object corresponding the destination IP Address if route is known, else returns null

        public void handleTimerEvent(int type)
        handles what happens when update timer and invalidate timer expires
        Parameters:
        type - of timer: type 1- update timer and type 2- invalid timer expired
